reference: This data is used in the Instrumental Variables chapter of The Effect.
title: Data from "Social Networks and the Decision to Insure"
description:
Description
The social_insure data contains data from Jai, De Janvry, and Saoudlet (2015) on a two-round social network-based experiment on getting farmers to get insurance. See the paper for more details.

parameters.intensive: Whether or not was assigned to "intensive" experimental session (1 = yes)
parameters.takeup_survey: Whether farmer ended up purchasing insurance. (1 = yes)
parameters.default: "Default option" in experimental format assigned to. (1 = default is to buy, 0 = default is to not buy)
parameters.male: Household Caracteristics: Gender of Household Head (1 = male)
parameters.disaster_prob: Perceived Probability of Disasters Next Year

format: A data frame with 1410 rows and 13 variables
